10.10.21  6:44 am   do you have any connection the devil

      not that i know of

10.10.21  5:45 am   Does your new song start with the letter A?  

      no

10.10.21  5:33 am   Bill, I just don't get it. I really, REALLY want to be good at piano. I practise for hours at a time, but I started at 13/14 and feel I'm making very little progress. What should I learn? How am I able to improve? I want to be able to improvise and to learn other music, but also to write my own. I don't know, I feel particularly lost today.

      the first question i have to ask is, what do you think 'good at piano' is? where did you first get an idea that that's what you wanted? how would you describe this? what are the benefits?

      innovative

      doing what backwards...... nevermind, yes

      i don't see why not

      try to avoid success also

      you

      it's a race, before it makes you right

      4

10.8.21  5:53 am   Im confused, is a standard 12 bar blues major or minor? Most people I hear use minor pentatonic  but that's apparently only because the tension of the minor third against the major third of the chord is a really bluesy sound. Does that mean a blues is major then? If minor pentatonic is used for tension? Or does it mean its minor?

      it's a lot like messy hair. is it going to the right or left? too cool to tell, for sure

10.8.21  4:58 am   if humans evolved from monkeys then why are there still monkeys

      that would mean that they only evolved from some of the monkeys

10.8.21  3:38 am   When x does y for you. Do you try to get y other ways or seek x in its place? 

      must seek the author of the story, for details on what the heck x and y really are

      they seem flippant, although i will admit i don't know what that means

      this one

10.7.21  4:26 am   what's the fastest way to dry a towel?

      put it on mars

10.7.21  1:54 am   What is your favourite color?

      black and white

10.7.21  1:24 am   hi do you answer questions 

      yes

10.7.21  1:03 am   is it random? is it chock full of meaning? does bill even know? is he masterminding it all or not really? it seems like he kind of isn't. yet at the same time. we don't know. can't ever really know. and so much meaning and emotoin comes through. and meaning kinda depends a lot on the interpretation of the reader. and can be created by reader. can it? it feels almost like we hold bill's soul. he doesn't understand it either. but it's powerful.

      imagine that every language ever made has been trying to accomplish the same thing, except none of them were good enough, because no language is good enough to do this. then, imagine i cannot explain exactly what this is because, like i said, no language is good enough to do this. hopefully that should at least paint a relatively clear picture of what my goals are

10.7.21  12:41 am   how do you tell the truth in a song but still have it be a good song

      tell even more of the truth than anyone has ever heard before. paste the truth all over the walls

      i intend to do everything right now

10.6.21  8:27 am   I think I have a game changing idea and don't know how to market it. Do I shop it around to influential people while I'm working on it or do I sit on the product until it's complete and start trying to promote it from zero? 

      if you have a game changing idea, you should go ahead and change the game

10.6.21  8:13 am   how to be epic?

      build a door

10.6.21  2:59 am   How often does the musical riff fairy visit your dreams to deposit more little subtle melodic synth riffs and flourishes for you to put in the background of your songs?

      never. i don't get those from dreams. from dreams i only get things that go in the foreground of the song
